line.comment: * Pirate Guild Base - Main AI Script
* Fix 1: Prevent Energy Cell shortage (makes autojump easier to handle)
* Added (Nicoman35): If ADS used, repair base's hull by ADS mechanics
* LU (Solarahawk): Added Phanon to neutral relations
* Neutralize base relation to all races but player to prevent too much killings
* Update Pirate->Player relations on all pirate bases and Guild-owned ships
* Set base type and number of wanted ships
* Special settings for very low difficulty
* End action, if plugin was disabled
* Let's repair ships (and remove useless locals)
* Repair Pirate Base hull over time (if task repair is not running, started by ADS NPC autocarrier)
* if not [THIS]-> is script 'Lib.Cmd.Anarkis.ACC.Task.Repairs' on stack of task=900
* Buy ship at shipyard (or add 500 credits, if pirate base doesn't have the money to buy a ship)
* Buy defences (or add 500 credits, if pirate base doesn't have the money to buy any defenses)
* If we still have a bunch of money let's give some to buy a Big Ship or use it to buy a pleasure dome if none here (and in pirate sector) or buy a new M7
* Neutralize base relation to all races but player to prevent too much killings (again)
* Exit loop, if this base does no longer belong to pirates

sval.val: Pirate Guild Base - Main AI Script
Fix 1: Prevent Energy Cell shortage (makes autojump easier to handle)
Added (Nicoman35): If ADS used, repair base's hull by ADS mechanics
LU (Solarahawk): Added Phanon to neutral relations
Neutralize base relation to all races but player to prevent too much killings
Update Pirate->Player relations on all pirate bases and Guild-owned ships
Set base type and number of wanted ships
Special settings for very low difficulty
End action, if plugin was disabled
Let's repair ships (and remove useless locals)
Repair Pirate Base hull over time (if task repair is not running, started by ADS NPC autocarrier)
if not [THIS]-> is script 'Lib.Cmd.Anarkis.ACC.Task.Repairs' on stack of task=900
Buy ship at shipyard (or add 500 credits, if pirate base doesn't have the money to buy a ship)
Buy defences (or add 500 credits, if pirate base doesn't have the money to buy any defenses)
If we still have a bunch of money let's give some to buy a Big Ship or use it to buy a pleasure dome if none here (and in pirate sector) or buy a new M7
Neutralize base relation to all races but player to prevent too much killings (again)
Exit loop, if this base does no longer belong to pirates
